\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{VNI2N}}
\logpage{[ 1, 1, 1 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X7D145BB38056C5D6}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\ \ \texttt{VNI2N({\mdseries\slshape graph, index{\textunderscore}or{\textunderscore}list{\textunderscore}of{\textunderscore}indices})\index{VNI2N@\texttt{VNI2N}}
\label{VNI2N}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (function)}}\\


 converts all indices in x to vertex names }

\logpage{[ 1, 1, 2 ]}\nobreak

\label{VNN2I}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (function)}}\\
